snippet: We examined contrarian bets on European bonds that are looking pretty smart right now. And with Treasury set to reduce its A.I.G. bet below 50 percent, Andrew Ross Sorkin called a critic of the bailout. A look back on our reporting of the past week's...
abstract: We examined contrarian bets on European bonds that are looking pretty smart right now. And with Treasury set to reduce its A.I.G. bet below 50 percent, Andrew Ross Sorkin called a critic of the bailout. A look back on our reporting of the past week's highs and lows in finance.

headline.main: Week in Review: Contrarian Bets Looking Smart
